name: Tidal
description:
CURRENTLY FOR DESKTOP PLAY ONLY.
PLEASE WAIT FOR IMAGES TO LOAD.
THANK YOU FOR PLAYING :)

A paper plane in a storm. How far does it fly?

...Storms are unpredictable.

Instructions:
"A" or Click/Touch to Fly. "Z" to Dive.
Flying depletes your stamina.
Hit the waves just right to boost upwards.
Fly as far as you can!

Developed in 8 hours for the Creative Assembly Game Jam 08/04/2016 by:

Benita, George, Bryn, Kyle, Matej
